Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle to moderate turn. of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium light brown. Circular stamp with amphora symbol.
Type series: KT591 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (317)
